page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: This document is composed of the work of groups at three schools: Sale Girls' Grammar and those described on pages 2 to 4. The topics covered are leisure and recreation, communications ,lifestyles, local history and community studies including studies of particular areas of interest to the children, such as parental occupations. The work represents both what is important to the chidren and how they see it. Subject only to some editorial control the work is entirely that of the groups involved.
